Create a smart matchbox thatally tracks the amount of matches inside, and when it's running low, it sends a notification to the user's phone to restock.
Develop a matchbox that doubles as a phone charger, so users can charge their phone on the go while also having access to matches.
Design a matchbox that has a built-in flashlight, so users can easily find matches in the dark.
Create a matchbox that has a touchless ignition system, so users can ignite a match without having to touch the matchbox.
Develop a matchbox that has a built-in fire starter, so users can easily start a fire with just a few matches.
